titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 3: Witness fThomas, Collation unit C06e

sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-03 19:23:51.102012 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2020-01-02T22:33:56.362-05:00.

body.div: If you do, you must have certainly lost that simplicity which was once your characteristic charm. Yet, if you will, smile at the warmth of my expressions, while I find every day new causes for repeating them.
